item.title: JSON schema inferenceÂ with Apache Spark
item.description: title breakdown JSON: JavaScript Object Notation, a popular semi-structured data interchange format schema inference: the process of using a computer to derive the emergent structure of semi-structured Apache Spark: a popular [[Open Source]] query execution engine introduction Ingesting and bringing structure to semi-structured data is an extremely common data-related task.
